p: A total of 55,536 individuals were identified from 8 phyla, 14 classes, 37 orders, 62 families. Within these families, 72 genera and 77 species could be distinguished, with most families represented in 3 major phyla (Additional file 1: Table S1). Densities of individuals ranged from 464 to 16,084 individuals m âˆ’2.
